channel.title: Making public client?
channel.description:
Ok, so i want to release my client for my players to lay my server lol.
If i use a jarmaker it makes the file, but then they still got all the files they can edit? and the port turns to null and it doesnt show the set-i.p.
So basically, my question is; How do you make your source to give to other players, so that it's not open. for example, the dodian client?
[u][b][size=10pt]Edit: Do i just obfuscate it?[/size][/b][/u]
-- Thanks --
